name: Operation Insanity
description: A Para-military Terrrorist organization is running amok . There is only one solution, send a single lone operative on a suicidal mission to stop them. You are that lone operative. Choose your character and lock and load for intense action as you fight your way through ever increasing difficult challenges. As you progress toward level 20 the enemy get tougher and more numerous. Will you be able to rise to the challenge? Are you good enough to complete Operation Insanity?
